name: Space Chase - Top 3D Sky Road Racing Game
name_original: Space Chase - Top 3D Sky Road Racing Game
description:
C’mon take a deep breath… You are about to take on the most thrilling drive of your life on this brutal freeway where vigilance is order of the day and carelessness is death itself.

You can pick temporary licenses to wreck havoc on this one-way route of no return.

License Invisibility: Become invisible and drive through other Jets

License Hit and Blast: Hit the car in front of you and you blast it.

License to Shoot: Anyone in front of your Jet ? They get shot, Period. This is the last time they will be seen on the way !

License LEAVE ME ALONE: Not many dare to come near you. Traffic disperses leaving you alone.

Flashing Jet: The license to expire anytime now.

Controls: Left side tap on iphone to go left – Right tap on the iphone to go right.

Goal: Pickup the licenses on the freeway and fly as far as possible towards the enemy head quarter before your Jet is destroyed.

Caution: Do not come near any jet on the free way if “Hit and Blast” or “Invisibility” license is not active.

What are you waiting for? Come take on the challenge but only if you have a BIG heart!
